description: Templates for industrial environment discoveries. Matched by keywords: machine, device, mechanism, industrial.

templates.fragmentContent: A damaged echo-stone preserves a fragment: '...production quotas exceeded for the third cycle. The Overseer demands we push the forges harder. Workers report strange sounds from the lower foundry...' The rest dissolves into static.
Schematics etched into a metal plate. The design appears to be a power distribution network, though several sections are marked with warning glyphs in a script no longer taught.
Safety notices posted throughout the area, written in formal Aesir: 'Unauthorized access to Level Seven facilities carries immediate termination. This is not negotiable.'
